data.oai_dc:dc: NOAA Daily Surface Meteorologic Data at NCDC Everglades Station (ID-082850), South Florida from January 1931 to December 2010
The National Climatic Data Center's (NOAA) daily mean, maximum, and minium air temperatures and daily precipitation collected at Everglades Station (Coop ID- 082850).
Everglades|South Florida|air temperature|precipitation|Florida Coastal Everglades LTER Program|1931|2010
